dynamic-hibernate.query:
SELECT exchanger_Id, name, ip, port, url, type, check_Port, system_Status, manual_Status FROM CSL_EXCHANGER WHERE 1=1 #if($exchanger_Id) AND exchanger_Id = :exchanger_Id #end #if($name) AND name LIKE :name #end #if($ip) AND ip LIKE :ip #end #if($port) AND port = :port #end #if($url) AND url = :url #end #if($type) AND type = :type #end #if($check_Port) AND check_Port = :check_Port #end #if($system_Status) AND system_Status = :system_Status #end #if($manual_Status) AND manual_Status = :manual_Status #end
ORDER BY exchanger_Id desc
